description:
Add efficiency to your stride. These 4-season trekking poles have cork grips that are easy to handle and don't feel slick in hot weather.

  • Natural cork grips wick away sweat
  • Non-slip foam extension grip allows you to move your hand down on steep or sloping terrain
  • Padded webbing straps are left- and right-hand specific
  • FlickLock adjustment mechanisms
  • Interchangeable Carbide tech tips can be changed or swapped out
  • Includes low-profile Trekking Baskets and larger Powder Baskets
name: Black Diamond Trail Cork Poles - Unisex
